param.name: toolbarCanCollapse
param.label: Enable Toolbar Collapse
param.description: Determines whether the toolbar can be collapsed by the user. If disabled, the collapser button will not be displayed.

param.name: toolbarLocation
param.label: Toolbar Location
param.description: The location of the toolbar. This options defauts to the top location just above the textarea

param.name: toolbarGroupCycling
param.label: Enable Toolbar Group Cycling
param.description: When this option is enabled it makes the arrow keys navigation cycle within the current toolbar group. Otherwise the arrows will move trought all items available in the toolbar. The TAB key will still be used to quickly jump among the toolbar groups.

param.name: toolbarStartupExpanded
param.label: Toolbar Startup Expanded
param.description: Determines whether the toolbar must start expanded when the editor is loaded.
